I’m taking a few weeks away from the blog. So today, an open thread with a request for suggestions on topics that you feel have been unexplored by the blog. Let me (and the other contributors) know the questions you have and what subjects you want to see addressed.

Or use this to comment on anything else, SBM-related. The floor is yours. See you in few weeks.
